projects.title: Welcome to the Magic Kingdom
projects.detail: Draws Magic Kingdom attraction locations on a Google map. Will also display attraction details from Foursquare when selected.

projects.title: My Reads Virtual Bookshelf
projects.detail: Simple React GoodReads clone to keep track of books you've read, books you want to read, and books you're currently reading.

projects.title: Frogger Clone
projects.detail: Cross the grass and reach the water! Avoid bugs along the way.

projects.title: @trumpratings on Twitter
projects.detail: Culls @readDonaldTrump's twitter feed and latest Gallup approval ratings. Retweets latest post with latest ratings.

projects.title: Reddit/Facebook Sharing Integration
projects.detail: Will message latest upvoted Reddit post to a Facebook user of your choice.
